text: Peter McLaren (17 March 1923 – 19 December 1996) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == References == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1923 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Peter McLaren (footballer)
